fields.name: Warning:
fields.value:
Being late again may result in termination of employment.
Attack: None
Defense: None

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: > Make someone late, causing their ability to happen last.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: > Nothing can stop you from delaying your target. Even death cannot stop you (you can act while dead).

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: > Kill all who oppose the Town.
